name: Chris Green
bio: Chris Green is the author of four books of poetry: The Sky Over Walgreens, Epiphany School, Résumé, and Everywhere West (Mayapple Press, 2019). His poetry has appeared in such publications as Poetry magazine, the New York Times, Court Green, Prairie Schooner, and Poetry East. He’s edited four anthologies, including I Remember: Chicago Veterans of War and most recently, American Gun: A Poem by 100 Chicagoans (Big Shoulders Books, 2020). He teaches in the English Department at DePaul University.
